title: Augusta County: A.M. Chacky to his Brother, February 6, 1865
summary: Chacky writes to his brother Ed about fooling a provost guard into letting him on a train to Fishersville. Chacky was a member of Wharton's Division of the Valley Army of Virginia.
keywords: Archivists have noted that this letter was written from Fishersville, Augusta County, Virginia.
